valerypopofftouchplusplugin.name: Valerypopoff Touch Plus
valerypopofftouchplusplugin.description: Extend system Touch plugin with additional options.

dont-click-through-objects.name: Don't touch through objects
dont-click-through-objects.desc: Set if you only want clicks and touches registered on the topmost objects.

dont-click-through-objects-on-other-laye.name: Don't touch through objects on other layers
dont-click-through-objects-on-other-laye.desc: Set if you only want clicks and touches registered on the objects that are not obscured by objects on higher layers.

dont-click-through-layers.name: Don't touch through layers
dont-click-through-layers.desc: Set if you only want clicks and touches registered on the topmost layers.

ignore-invisible-objects.name: Ignore invisible objects
ignore-invisible-objects.desc: Set if you only want clicks and touches registered on the visible objects (Visible and opacity > 0).

ignore-invisible-layers.name: Ignore invisible layers
ignore-invisible-layers.desc: Set if you only want clicks and touches registered on the objects that are on visible layers (Visible and opacity > 0).

dont-click-through-objects-on-other-laye.list-name: Set 'Don't touch through objects on other layers'
dont-click-through-objects-on-other-laye.display-text: Set 'Don't touch through objects on other layers' [b]{0}[/b]
dont-click-through-objects-on-other-laye.description: Set 'Don't touch through objects on other layers'
